text: Dawn (, ) is a 1985 French Hungarian Israeli drama movie directed by Miklós Jancsó and starring Serge Avedikian, Paul Blain, Christine Boisson, Philippe Léotard, Michael York. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Israeli movies Category:Movies directed by Miklós Jancsó
title: Dawn (1985 movie)
